data.title: Gourevitch, Alexander
data.text: "The Right to Strike: A Radical View." American Political Science Review, vol. 112, no. 04, 2018, pp. 905-917. "Quitting Work but Not the Job: Liberty and the Right to Strike." Perspectives on Politics, vol. 14, no. 02, 2016, pp. 307-323. "Liberty and its economies." Politics, Philosophy & Economics, vol. 14, no. 4, 2015, pp. 365-390. "Police Work: The Centrality of Labor Repression in American Political History." Perspectives on Politics, vol. 13, no. 03, 2015, pp. 762-773. "Decline of the Strike." Dissent, vol. 61, no. 4, 2014, pp. 142-147. "Welcome to the Dark Side: A Classical-Liberal Argument for Economic Democracy." Critical Review, vol. 26, no. 3-4, 2014, pp. 290-305. "Labor Republicanism and the Transformation of Work." Political Theory, vol. 41, no. 4, 2013, pp. 591-617. "The Labor Question in America: Economic Democracy in the Gilded Age, Rosanne Currarino, Champaign, IL.: University of Illinois Press, 2011." Historical Materialism, vol. 21, no. 2, 2013, pp. 179-190. "Borrowed Energy." Dissent, vol. 59, no. 3, 2012, pp. 93-96. "Debt, Freedom, and Inequality." Philosophical Topics, vol. 40, no. 1, 2012, pp. 135-151. "WILLIAM MANNING AND THE POLITICAL THEORY OF THE DEPENDENT CLASSES." Modern Intellectual History, vol. 9, no. 02, 2012, pp. 331-360. "Labor and Republican Liberty." Constellations, vol. 18, no. 3, 2011, pp. 431-454. "Environmentalism--Long Live the Politics of Fear." Public Culture, vol. 22, no. 3, 2010, pp. 411-424.
